mapper.select: select y.* from ( select a.img , a.hinum , a.title , a.price , a.times , subname from ( select img,e.hinum,title,price,times ,sunum from experience_info e inner join house_img h on e.hinum=h.hinum where e.div_type=3 and ordernum=1 )a inner join subDetail s on a.sunum=s.sunum limit #{row} ,15) y order by rand();

select count(*) from ( select a.img , a.hinum , a.title , a.price , a.times , subname from ( select img,e.hinum,title,price,times ,sunum from experience_info e inner join house_img h on e.hinum=h.hinum where e.div_type=3 and ordernum=1 )a inner join subDetail s on a.sunum=s.sunum) s;

select count(*) from( select a.img , a.hinum , a.title , a.price , a.times , subname from ( select img,e.hinum,title,price,times ,sunum from experience_info e inner join house_img h on e.hinum=h.hinum where e.div_type=3 and ordernum=1 and (sunum=163 or sunum=166 or sunum=164 or sunum=165 or sunum=136 or sunum=135 or sunum=134))a inner join subDetail s on a.sunum=s.sunum) s;

select count(*) from ( select a.img , a.hinum , a.title , a.price , a.times , subname from ( select img,e.hinum,title,price,times ,sunum from experience_info e inner join house_img h on e.hinum=h.hinum where e.div_type=3 and ordernum=1 and ((sunum<75 and sunum>46) or(sunum>89 and sunum<127)))a inner join subDetail s on a.sunum=s.sunum) s;

select count(c.hinum) from ( select a.img , a.hinum , a.title , a.price , a.times , subname from ( select img,e.hinum,title,price,times ,sunum ,regdate from experience_info e inner join house_img h on e.hinum=h.hinum where e.div_type=3 and ordernum=1)a inner join subDetail s on a.sunum=s.sunum order by a.regdate desc) c;
